items.value: %113% has discovered a %111% named %00@ who secretly harbors a deep grudge against %01@. Using the Book of the Dead and the energy from the vast corpses in %04@, %114b is able to turn %00@ into a Necromancer, with the unholy power to raise skeletons.

%113% performed the ritual to bestow Death Magic upon %00@, completing his transformation into a Necromancer. With his newfound power, he has founded the new Zirana Faction, claiming %04@ as their unholy capital.
